text: You can manage your account settings, update payment methods, and view order history in your account dashboard. For account-related questions, contact support.

We offer full refunds within 30 days of purchase. To request a refund, please contact our customer support team with your order ID and reason for refund. Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days.
Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping is available for 2-3 business day delivery. Tracking information is provided once your order ships.
For technical issues, please provide your device model, operating system, and a detailed description of the problem. Our technical team will respond within 24 hours.
Common solutions: 1) Clear browser cache and cookies 2) Try a different browser 3) Disable browser extensions 4) Check internet connection 5) Restart your device
